definitions.text: endless loop of flexible material between two rotating shafts or pulleys
a band to tie or buckle around the body (usually at the waist)
an elongated region where a specific condition or characteristic is found

examples: he took a bash right in his face
he got a bang on the head

definitions.text: a path or strip (as cut by one course of mowing)
ammunition (usually of small caliber) loaded in flexible linked strips for use in a machine gun

examples: he gave the table a whack
